com.buschmais.xo.api.bootstrap

Class XOUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.xo.api.bootstrap.XOUnit

  • public class XOUnit
extends Object
    Represents a XO unit, i.e. a configuration for a XOManagerFactory.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • XOUnit

        public XOUnit(String name,
              String description,
              URI uri,
              Class<?> provider,
              Set<? extends Class<?>> types,
              List<? extends Class<?>> instanceListeners,
              ValidationMode validationMode,
              ConcurrencyMode concurrencyMode,
              Transaction.TransactionAttribute defaultTransactionAttribute,
              Properties properties)
        Constructs a XO unit.
        Parameters:
        name - The name which is used to uniquely identify the XO unit.
        description - A human readable description (optional).
        uri - The datastore specific URI.
        provider - The provider class to use.
        types - The entity types to register.
        instanceListeners - The instance listener types.
        validationMode - The ValidationMode to use.
        concurrencyMode - The ConcurrencyMode to use.
        defaultTransactionAttribute - The Transaction.TransactionAttribute to use.
        properties - Additional properties to be passed to the provider.

        defaultTransactionAttribute - The Transaction.TransactionAttribute to use.
        properties - Additional properties to be passed to the provider.
